009package imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay;
010
011import java.util.Collection;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay.guibas.TriangulationGuibas;
016
017/**
018 * Interface specification for various implementations of the
019 * Delaunay triangulation.
020 */
021public interface DelaunayTriangulation {
022        
023        /**
024         * Returns the number of triangles in this triangulation.
025         * @return the number of triangles
026         */
027        public int size();
028        
029        /**
030         * Returns a list of {@link Triangle} instances
031         * contained in this triangulation. The list does not contain the initial outer 
032         * triangle.
033         * @return a list of triangles 
034         */
035        public List<Triangle> getTriangles();
036        
037        /**
038         * Returns a list of 2D vertices (implementing the {@link Pnt2d} interface)
039         * contained in this triangulation. The list does not contain the
040         * vertices of the initial (outer) triangle.
041         * @return a list of points
042         */
043        public List<Pnt2d> getPoints();
044        
045        /**
046         * Performs Delaunay triangulation on the specified points.
047         * Supplied points are inserted without shuffling, i.e.,
048         * in their original order.
049         * 
050         * @param points the point set to be triangulated
051         * @return a {@link DelaunayTriangulation} instance
052         */
053        public static DelaunayTriangulation from(Collection<? extends Pnt2d> points) {
054                return DelaunayTriangulation.from(points, false);
055        }
056        
057        /**
058         * Performs Delaunay triangulation on the specified points with
059         * (optional) random insertion order.
060         * 
061         * @param points the point set to be triangulated
062         * @param shuffle set {@code true} to randomly shuffle the input points
063         * @return a {@link DelaunayTriangulation} instance
064         */
065        public static DelaunayTriangulation from(Collection<? extends Pnt2d> points, boolean shuffle) {
066                return new TriangulationGuibas(points, shuffle);
067        }
068
069}
